summary: Development server is confirmed running at localhost:3000. Created environment configuration template for Google OAuth setup. The Getnius app is fully built with authentication UI, but requires Google OAuth credentials in .env.local file to enable sign-in functionality. Provided detailed setup instructions for Google Cloud Console OAuth configuration.
current_status: App is live and accessible at localhost:3000 with complete UI. Only missing Google OAuth credentials to enable authentication flow. All market intelligence features and beautiful UI components are ready and functional.
